reviews.text: Fantastic platform for business sales. The process was smooth and professional from start to finish.
reviews.author: Maria Andersson

reviews.text: The valuation was spot on and helped us set the right price. Got in touch with serious buyers within a week.
reviews.author: Johan Eriksson

reviews.text: Professional handling of the entire process. The NDA function and secure data room made due diligence easy.
reviews.author: Anna Lindberg

step1.title: STEP 1: REGISTER
step1.description: Registration on BOLAXO is simple and takes only 2-3 minutes. You just need to fill in some basic information about yourself and your company to get started.
step1.step1Desc: Use email or BankID to register. BankID gives you extra security and verification from the start.
step1.step2Desc: Tell us about your company: name, industry, size and what you're looking for. You can always update this later.
step1.step3Desc: Complete a quick BankID verification to unlock all features and get the "Verified Seller" badge.
step1.step4Desc: Now you can value your company, create listings, get matches and start negotiating with buyers.
step1.freeDesc: - You pay nothing for registration or to use the platform to find buyers.

step2.title: STEP 2: VALUE
step2.description: Our advanced valuation algorithm analyzes your company from multiple angles and gives you a professional value range - completely free. Suitable for everything from small startups to established mid-sized companies.

financial.title: Financial analysis
financial.desc: We analyze your revenue, results, cash flow and growth rate over the last 3 years to create a solid foundation.

comparison.title: Industry comparison
comparison.desc: We compare your company with similar companies that have been sold recently to set the right multiple based on the market.

methods.title: Valuation methods
methods.desc: We use EBITDA multiple, return valuation and revenue multiple to triangulate a fair value.

report.title: Detailed report
report.desc: You get a PDF report with value range, assumptions, charts and concrete tips to increase value.

step2.tipDesc: Use the valuation to set a reasonable price on your listing and as a starting point in negotiations.

step3.title: STEP 3: MATCH
step3.header: Intelligent matching with the right buyers
step3.description: Our AI algorithm analyzes profiles and needs to find the best matches. We only present serious, verified buyers who actually fit your company.

aiAnalysis.title: AI analysis of buyers
aiAnalysis.desc: The system analyzes what each buyer is looking for: industry, region, size, EBITDA level and other criteria.

automatic.title: Automatic matching
automatic.desc: Your listing is automatically matched with buyers whose criteria match your profile.

verified.title: Verified buyers
verified.desc: All buyers are verified with BankID, which guarantees they are serious and relevant.

control.title: Your control is maintained
control.desc: You decide what matches can see before they sign the NDA - you can be completely anonymous if you want.

step3.saveTimeDesc: Instead of waiting for random inquiries, you get relevant buyers presented automatically.

step4.title: STEP 4: NEGOTIATE
step4.header: Secure negotiation from start to finish
step4.description: BOLAXO ensures a safe and professional negotiation process with automatic NDA, secure data room and legal tools that save both time and money.

nda.title: Automatic NDA
nda.desc: Before the buyer sees sensitive information, they must sign a digital confidentiality agreement with BankID. You are always protected.

encrypted.title: Encrypted communication
encrypted.desc: Discuss details through the platform's built-in messaging system with end-to-end encryption. No uncertainty.

templates.title: Legal templates
templates.desc: Get templates for LOI, SPA and other critical documents - saves massive legal costs and accelerates the process.

dealManagement.title: Deal Management
dealManagement.desc: Track progress, milestones, documents and payments in one place. Everything organized and transparent.

step4.resultDesc: Typically 60-90 days from LOI to closing - much faster than the traditional route with external brokers.

about.title: About us
about.heroSubtitle: BOLAXO was created to make M&A transparent, secure and accessible to everyone.
about.missionText: To democratize business sales by making the process transparent, secure and accessible to all Swedish entrepreneurs.
about.visionText: To become the Nordic region's leading platform for business transactions where every entrepreneur can sell and buy companies digitally.
about.whyStartedText1: We saw how many small and medium-sized entrepreneurs wanted to sell their life's work, but lacked a modern, digital platform for it. Most were forced to engage expensive traditional brokers or search far and wide without structure.
about.whyStartedText2: We believe that technology can make this process easier, faster and more accessible. That's why we created BOLAXO - a platform that automates the cumbersome and lets sellers and buyers focus on what matters.
about.teamSubtitle: Experienced entrepreneurs and tech-builders with a passion for M&A

team.name: Erik Andersson
team.title: Founder & CEO
team.desc: 15+ years in M&A and PE. Former Investment Manager at Investor AB.

team.name: Sara Bergström
team.title: CTO
team.desc: Tech entrepreneur with 12 years of experience. Former Senior Tech Lead at iZettle.

team.name: David Lundström
team.title: CFO
team.desc: Financial analyst. 10 years at Goldman Sachs. Expert in valuation models.

values.desc: We are open and honest about how everything works

values.desc: Your data and transactions are always safe with us

values.title: Innovation
values.desc: We use technology to solve real problems

faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about BOLAXO
faq.contactUs: Contact us directly and we'll be happy to help

whatIs.a: BOLAXO is an automated marketplace for buying and selling companies. We connect sellers and buyers of SME companies in a secure and efficient way, with automatic valuation, smart matching and complete anonymity until NDA signing.

howItWorks.a: Sellers start with free valuation (5 min), then create an ad and publish. The system automatically matches with relevant buyers. Buyers search, sign NDA digitally for full information, and can then send LOI. The entire process from NDA to closing is handled in our deal management platform.

cost.q: What does it cost to use BOLAXO?
cost.a: Valuation is always free! For sellers: Free (0 SEK - draft), Basic (495 SEK/month), Pro (895 SEK/month), Pro+ Featured (1,495 SEK/month). For buyers it is completely free to search and browse.

freeValuation.q: How do I get a free valuation?
freeValuation.a: Click on "Free valuation" and fill in our form. The system analyzes your company with 10 data sources and gives you a professional valuation in 5 minutes. You get a PDF report completely free!

timeToSell.q: How long does it take to sell?
timeToSell.a: It varies depending on company and industry, but on average 3-9 months from publication to closing. With our smart matching, the process can go faster.

anonymous.a: Yes! You choose your own anonymity level. Buyers only see this information after NDA signing. All communication goes through our NDA-protected platform.

freeSearch.q: Is it free to search for companies?
freeSearch.a: Yes, completely free! Creating an account, searching, watching and getting matches is completely free for buyers. You only pay when you want to close a deal and purchase the Deal Management service.

findRight.q: How do I find the right company?
findRight.a: Our AI-driven matching algorithm analyzes your criteria and recommends relevant companies. You can also search manually with filters on industry, region, revenue and EBITDA. We help you find the right match!

discount.q: Are there discounts for long-term contracts?
discount.a: Yes, contact our sales team for a customized quote. Discounts for annual contracts are possible, especially for Pro and Pro+ Featured packages.

dataProtection.a: We use BankID for all verification, HTTPS + AES-256 encryption for all data, and digital NDA agreements signed by both parties. Your security is our highest priority.

broker.title: For business brokers
broker.subtitle: Pipeline overview, automatic deal tracking and complete statistics – everything you need to drive your business forward, faster.
broker.pipelineDesc: See all your deals in the pipeline with AI-driven conversion analysis and risk assessment
broker.bankIdDesc: All broker licenses are personal and require BankID verification to ensure legitimacy. This gives you a "Verified broker" badge that increases trust with users.
broker.analyticsDesc: Volume, completion rate, pipeline value and conversion – all in your own dashboard
broker.licensesSubtitle: Personal licenses. Need more brokers? Buy one license per person.

broker.faqShare: Can multiple brokers share a license?
broker.faqShareAnswer: No, licenses are personal and require BankID verification. Each broker needs their own license.
broker.faqAds: How many ads can I have active?
broker.faqAdsAnswer: Pro: 10 simultaneously. Premium: unlimited. You can upgrade anytime.
broker.faqInvoice: Can I invoice my customers through the platform?
broker.faqInvoiceAnswer: Yes, in the Premium license you can add your margin and invoice customers directly through the system.
broker.faqApiAnswer: The Premium license includes REST API to integrate BOLAXO with your CRM or website.
broker.verified: You are verified and can purchase a license

valuation.title: Free company valuation
valuation.subtitle: Get professional valuation in 5 minutes
valuation.disclaimer: This valuation is based on information you provide and general market data. For a binding valuation we recommend consulting an authorized valuer or financial advisor.
valuation.whatWorth: What is your company worth right now?
valuation.indicative: Get an indicative valuation in a few minutes – same methodology as in real deals, adapted for quick overview.
valuation.methodsDesc: We combine several established valuation methods for a fair assessment
valuation.disclaimerBold: The value is indicative and does not constitute financial advice.
valuation.disclaimerDetail: For an in-depth valuation we recommend a review with a valuation specialist (30 min free for Pro/Enterprise).
valuation.ctaDesc: Get a professional valuation completely free. No hidden fees or commitments. It only takes 5 minutes.
valuation.howItWorksDesc: Follow these 4 steps to get your indicative valuation

salja.heroTitle: From listing to closing – step by step
salja.heroSubtitle: We automate the complex and give you full control over the process

step1.title: Create the listing
step1.description: Fill in key figures and relevant data, add images and a short pitch. Need a complete pitch deck? We'll take care of it for you.

step2.title: Publish and reach buyers
step2.description: The listing is pushed to watchlists and top lists. Buyers are verified and contact you via the platform. You see live data on views and inquiries from potential buyers.

step3.title: NDA & questions
step3.description: Buyers sign NDA with BankID and can ask questions. You receive email / push notifications for new NDA requests and choose to approve or reject. You can be completely anonymous until you have approved the NDA.

step4.title: Data room & DD
step4.description: Share the right documents with the right people and follow interest in real time. Secure document storage with version history, watermarking and viewing logs. Receive indicative bids (LOI) via a structured form.

step5.title: LOI to closing
step5.description: Start the formal sale with our templates and a milestone plan. We streamline the process and minimize unnecessary work so that lawyer/accountant steps in only when really needed—this saves both time and money. Need help with final negotiation and agreements? We match you with the right advisor.

pricing.title: PRICING OVERVIEW
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing without hidden fees. Start free, upgrade when you want.

items.q: What is the valuation and how does it work?
items.a: Our automatic valuation analyzes your company using three methods: EBITDA multiple, return valuation and revenue multiple. We automatically fetch data from 10 sources. You get a realistic value range, professional report and concrete tips. Completely free and takes 5 minutes.
Yes! You choose yourself what should be visible before NDA. Many choose to only show industry, region and approximate revenue until the buyer has signed a confidentiality agreement with BankID.
When buyers have submitted LOI, you can start a formal transaction with automatic milestones, document management, payment tracking and activity log. Invite advisors with different rights.

items.q: What analytics do I get to see?
items.a: You see: views over time, NDA requests, conversion funnel, geographic distribution of buyers, and growth curve. Updated in real time on your dashboard.

items.q: How do you ensure that buyers are serious?
items.a: All buyers are verified with BankID and must sign NDA. We have smart matching (87-94% match score) that helps the right buyers find the right company.

items.q: Do you take commission on sale?
items.a: No commission on listing packages. For Deal Management (optional): 1-3% of transaction value split between buyer and seller. Traditional brokers take 8-15%.

kopareSaFungerarDet.heroTitle: Bolaxo – Find, review and acquire safely and efficiently
kopareSaFungerarDet.heroSubtitle: Create a credible buyer profile with BankID. Filter listings, sign NDA and get access to data room – all in the same flow.

step1.title: Profile & watchlists
step1.description: Log in with BankID and fill in your profile. Set watchlists and get email/push when new matches appear.
step1.detailedDescription: Log in with BankID and fill in your profile with industries, size and financing. Feel free to add LinkedIn, short investment pitch and what you're looking for. More profile info gives higher credibility and more sellers let you in.

step2.title: Search & express interest
step2.description: Filter by industry, region, revenue, price. Send interest inquiry on relevant listings.
step2.detailedDescription: Filter by industry, region, revenue, price, number of employees, verification and reason for sale. Send interest inquiry on relevant listings and get answers directly in the platform.

step3.title: NDA
step3.description: Request access and sign NDA with BankID. Seller is anonymous until NDA is approved.
step3.detailedTitle: Sign NDA and get full access
step3.detailedDescription: Request access and sign NDA with BankID. Seller is anonymous until NDA is approved. After approval you see extended info and can ask questions directly to the seller.

step4.title: Q&A, shortlist & data room
step4.description: Ask questions in secure chat. Compare key figures side-by-side. Get access to data room.
step4.detailedDescription: Ask questions in secure chat. Add listings to shortlist and compare key figures side-by-side. Get permission-controlled access to data room with version history, watermarking and activity log.

step5.title: LOI & closing
step5.description: Send indicative bid (LOI) via our template. Follow milestone plan: DD → agreement → closing.
step5.detailedDescription: Send indicative bid (LOI) via our template with price, terms and timeline. Follow milestone plan: DD → agreement → closing. Need support? We match you with lawyer/accountant in the final phase.

chatWidget.initialMessage: Hi! I'm your AI assistant for BOLAXO. How can I help you today?

base.valuationResponse: Our AI-based valuation analyzes your company based on several factors such as revenue, industry, growth and profitability. You get a professional valuation in just 5 minutes - completely free! The valuation is based on real deals and industry standards.
base.cost: What does it cost to sell?
base.costResponse: It's free to create an ad and get a valuation! We have three packages: Basic (495 SEK/month), Pro (995 SEK/month) and Enterprise (1995 SEK/month). You only pay when your ad is active. There is also the option of a success fee of 0.75-1.5% on completed deals.
base.timeline: How long does the process take?
base.timelineResponse: From listing to closing usually takes 90-180 days. Valuation takes 5 minutes, NDA signing 1-2 days, due diligence 2-6 weeks and the actual transaction 60-90 days. We help you through the entire process!

valuation.freeResponse: Yes, the valuation is completely free and without obligations! You get a professional valuation based on AI and real market data in just 5 minutes.

buyer.find: How do I find the right company?
buyer.findResponse: Our smart matching analyzes your preferences and shows companies that suit you. You can filter by industry, region, revenue and much more. All sellers are verified with BankID for your security.
buyer.beforeNda: What do I see before NDA?
buyer.beforeNdaResponse: Before NDA you see industry, region, approximate revenue, number of employees and a general description. After signed NDA you get access to company name, exact figures and detailed information.

botResponses.greeting: Hi! How can I help you today?
botResponses.pricing: We have three pricing plans: Basic (495 SEK/month), Pro (995 SEK/month) and Enterprise (1995 SEK/month). Valuation and creating an ad is completely free! Would you like to know more about what's included in each package?
botResponses.valuation: Our AI valuation takes only 5 minutes and is completely free! You get a professional assessment based on industry standards and real deals. Would you like to start a valuation now?
botResponses.selling: Perfect that you want to sell! The process is simple: 1) Do a free valuation, 2) Create an ad, 3) Get matched with buyers, 4) Complete the deal safely. Should I guide you to the valuation?
botResponses.buying: As a buyer you get access to verified sellers and smart matches. It's completely free for buyers! You can filter by industry, region and size. Would you like to create a buyer account?
botResponses.contact: I'm happy to help! You can also click on "I want to be contacted" below and we'll call you. Or email us at kontakt@bolaxo.se.
botResponses.default: Thanks for your question! I'm here to help you with everything related to business sales and purchases. Can you tell me a bit more about what you need help with? You can also click on "I want to be contacted" if you prefer to talk to a human.

ddUpload.title: Due Diligence - Step by Step
ddUpload.subtitle: Conduct a professional business inspection before purchase. We analyze all documents with GPT and generate a DD report.

process.title: The Process
steps: You upload documents for each DD category
GPT analyzes all documents and identifies risks
A professional DD report is generated automatically
The report groups findings by category and severity
You can present the report to your partners/lawyers

ddUpload.tip: Tip: You don't need to upload all documents - the more you upload, the better the DD report. Even partial documentation adds value.
ddUpload.uploadSubtitle: Upload documents for Your Due Diligence analysis

financial.name: Financial Due Diligence
financial.description: Financial statements, results, cash flow and financial status

bokslut.title: Audited Financial Statements (latest 3 years)
bokslut.why: Analysis: Revenue trend, EBITDA development, working capital, cash flow quality
bokslut.examples: Annual reports 2022-2024, income statements, balance sheets

skatter.title: Tax Declaration & Payment Proof
skatter.why: Verify taxes paid, identify aggressive tax planning
skatter.examples: K10, VAT declaration, payment receipts last 2 years

cash.title: Bank Details & Cash Flow
cash.why: Check real liquidity and cash drains
cash.examples: Last 12 months bank statements, cash flow analysis

skulder.title: Debt List & Financing Agreements
skulder.why: Map all financing and identify covenant risks
skulder.examples: All bank loans, lease agreements, remaining terms

kundfordran.title: Accounts Receivable & Customer Analysis
kundfordran.why: Analysis of customer dependency and revenue quality
kundfordran.examples: Customer lists, top 10 customers, revenue per customer

legal.name: ️ Legal Due Diligence
legal.description: Contracts, ownership, IP and legal risks

bolag.title: Company Matters (registration, meeting minutes)
bolag.why: Verify ownership structure and any pre-emption rights
bolag.examples: Share certificates from Companies House, articles of association, meeting minutes

avtal.title: Material Contracts (customer contracts, suppliers)

step2.subtitle: Important information for the valuation
step2.customerConcentrationTooltip: What percentage of revenue comes from your largest customer?
step2.totalDebtHelpText: Enter total for all interest-bearing debt: bank loans incl. short-term portion, utilized overdraft, leasing (cars/machinery/premises), shareholder loans. Exclude supplier debt and tax debt.

step3.title: Financial Information
step3.subtitle: Financial overview
step3.otherOperatingCostsHelpText: E.g. administration, IT, consultants, insurance, electricity/heating/water, repairs & maintenance, etc.
step3.revenue3YearsTooltip: Total percentage increase from 3 years ago
step3.cogsAutoCalculated: Automatically calculated from net revenue and gross margin

step5.title: Qualitative questions

step6.title: Review & Submit
step6.subtitle: Check your information

valuationFormModal.needMoreInfo: Now we just need a few more details to give you an accurate valuation.

checkout.heroTitle: The future platform for business transfers
checkout.heroSubtitle: A digital intermediary that handles the entire journey from first contact to ownership transfer. By combining AI, legal automation and direct API connections, we make the process seamless, secure and almost completely self-service.
solutions: Everything happens digitally – without paper, without legal costs
No one needs to chase certificates, signatures or administrative updates
From sales interest to final legal ownership transfer in days, not months
Buyers and sellers get immediate transparency and security through AI
checkout.ctaSubtitle: Whether you're a seller or buyer, you can get started in minutes. No complicated process, just the digital transformation your business transfer needs.

analysis.title: Automatic company analysis
analysis.description: AI analyzes the company and generates valuation

dataCollection.subtitle: Data collection via API
items: Companies House – registration details, ownership structure, share capital
Statistics Bureau and industry data – benchmark against comparable companies

aiAnalysis.subtitle: AI analysis and valuation
items: Analysis of finances, assets and risk profile
Valuation based on multiples, cash flows and industry standards
Summary of strengths, weaknesses and action recommendations

matchmaking.title: Automated listing and matching
matchmaking.description: Platform matches sellers with the right buyers

automaticListing.subtitle: Automatic listing
items: AI writes pitch text based on valuation and industry data
System indexes company data for SEO

realtimeMatching.subtitle: Real-time matching
items: AI matches companies against buyer database by budget, industry and geography
Smart recommendations based on historical data

onboarding.title: Secure buyer onboarding
onboarding.description: Verification and access to secure data room

verification.subtitle: Identity and financial verification
items: KYC (Know Your Customer) via BankID or equivalent
Financial verification via credit check or bank statements

confidentiality.subtitle: Confidentiality and access
items: Opening of personal data room after verification

documentManagement.subtitle: Automatic document management
items: AI creates checklists based on industry and size
Version control and timestamping of all documents

collaboration.subtitle: Collaboration and reporting
items: Buyer can comment directly in the system
Summarized findings and recommendations for negotiation

automaticContract.subtitle: Automatic contract management
items: Purchase agreement generated automatically from process data
Plain language explanations of all clauses
Alternative clauses selectable with one click

payment.subtitle: Payment and follow-up
items: Escrow function – secure payment until closing
Tax Agency notification for VAT and corporate tax
Bank updates for company account and assets

nda.mustLoginDesc: You must be logged in to sign the NDA.
nda.alreadySignedDesc: You have already signed the NDA for this object. Waiting for the seller to give you access.
nda.whatHappensNextContent: The seller has been notified and will choose whether to give you access to the data room, wait, or ask further questions in the chat. You will receive a message when the seller has approved your access.
nda.step1: The seller reviews your profile and NDA request
nda.step2: They choose to approve, ask questions, or wait
nda.step3: You will receive an email when you have access to the data room
nda.purposeDesc: This agreement governs the exchange of confidential information in connection with a potential business transfer.
nda.confidentialInfo5: All information in the data room
nda.commitment2: Not share information with third parties without approval
nda.commitment3: Only use the information for evaluation of the deal
nda.commitment4: Delete/return material if the deal is not completed
nda.validityDesc: The agreement is valid for 24 months from the signing date.
nda.watermarkingDesc: All information is watermarked with your user ID. Downloads are logged.
nda.whyInterested: Why are you interested in this company? (Optional)
nda.whyInterestedPlaceholder: Briefly describe your background and why this particular company suits you. This helps the seller make decisions faster...
nda.whyInterestedTip: Tip: A well-written motivation increases the chance that the seller will approve your NDA quickly

klart.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to publish
klart.errorPublishing: Something went wrong when publishing. Try again.
klart.publishingDesc: This will only take a few seconds
klart.success: Done! Your listing is now published
klart.successDesc: You are now receiving NDA requests from qualified buyers
klart.notificationsDesc: You will receive an email when someone wants to sign an NDA or asks a question. You can also log in here to follow interest in real time.
klart.tip: Tip: Prepare documents for the data room now so you can respond quickly to buyer requests
